sentences.en: Carolyn is a recipient of the Citation for Meritorious Service.
sentences.cn: 卡洛琳是位扶轮基金会有功服务奖受奖人.

sentences.en: He has also received a meritorious service award from Rotary Down Under.
sentences.cn: 他也曾荣获澳纽扶轮地域杂志的有功服务奖.

sentences.en: He meant to win golden opinions by meritorious exertion , by ingenious learning, by amiable compliance.
sentences.cn: 他想以富有成绩的努力, 真心诚意的求学, 使人喜爱的听话,博得黄金般的好评.

sentences.en: He thought that he, far from being a routed general , had meritorious service to his credit.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己是有功之臣, 不是败军之将.

sentences.en: He was praised for his meritorious service as governor general.
sentences.cn: 他做为总督由于有功受到了表彰.

sentences.en: He was praised for his meritorious service.
sentences.cn: 他由于出色地工作而受到称赞.

sentences.en: He wrote a meritorious theme about his visit to the cotton mill.
sentences.cn: 他写了一篇关于参观棉纺织厂的有价值的论文.

sentences.en: I had been promoted for what was called gallant and meritorious service.
sentences.cn: 我之所以得到提拔是由于立下了所谓的英勇卓越的功勋。

sentences.en: I know well that courage is required to leave, that it is hard; but the harder it is, the more meritorious.
sentences.cn: 我知道，离开这儿是要有勇气的，也是困难的，但越困难就越值得赞扬。

sentences.en: It's an honour for a mother like me to see my son do a meritorious deed.
sentences.cn: 儿子立功,做娘的脸上也好看.

sentences.en: Perform meritorious service to atone for one's crimes so as to obtain clemency from the people.
sentences.cn: 立功赎罪,以求得人民的宽恕.

sentences.en: The expected budget announcement today that meritorious teachers will be paid bonuses, based on NAPLAN test results and other criteria, is a step along the path.
sentences.cn: 现今基于教学评估计划测试的结果以及其他标准的预期的预算公告：有功的教师会奖以奖金，是走上轨道的一步。

sentences.en: The third chapter about the determination of rendering meritorious service.
sentences.cn: 第三章论述了本罪立功的认定.

sentences.en: Their meritorious deeds for the motherland will ever be remembered in the annuals of history!
sentences.cn: 他们为祖国建立的丰功伟绩永垂史册!

sentences.en: Those who render meritorious service receive awards.
We would have to regard these actions as good and meritorious.
sentences.cn: 我们将不得不认为这些行为是善举和值得赞誉的举动.

sentences.en: What meritorious feats they had done!
sentences.cn: 真是丰功伟绩,天赐的横财!

words.tran_cn: 有功绩的；有价值的；值得称赞的
